transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan Gopal ji good morning Himanshu baat kar raha hu India Mart se boliye.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Ji ji sir aapka feedback mila ho lekin sir maine to acknowledge kiya hi tha hamari team ne pura jo bhi sequence sir ne aur isme jo bhi work hai sir category ka wo maine bataya aapko ek bar video meeting pe bhi mai request kar raha tha ki aa jaiye sari chije discuss kar lete aap se aap time nahi de rahe ho.
Customer: Are kya time do aap bevkufi si baat kar rahe ho aap kya time do bataiye.
Executive: Sir aap online to aaiye video meeting meri problem meri problem ye thi ki mere pass jo inquiry aati hai right order value ki baat kiya tha aapne order value do se char lakh ka hona chahiye aap meri baat sunenge mai aapki sununga bataiye bataiye aapne call ko lagaya meri sunne ke liye aapki batane ke liye bataiye bataiye sir.
Customer: Meri sunenge aapki batao bataiye boliye sir boliye.
Customer: Meri issue ye hai aapki inquiry waise to aati bhi nahi hai aur aati hai to wo within second me by lead ho jati hai matlab ek second bhi nahi lagta usko kon by lead kar leta pata bhi nahi lagta thik hai aur by lead ki baat kar rahe ho fir maine bola aap se aap bich me mat boliye ya to aap boliye fir mai bolta hu.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai.
Customer: Aap boliye fir.
Executive: Nahi nahi mai inquiry aap keh rahe the na by lead ki baat kar rahe ho ki jo aap boliye pehle mai mai sun leta hu ya fir mai mai bol raha hu aap sun lijiye nahi aap aap hi boliye mai bas bich me mat tokna.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Mai ye bol raha hu jaise aapki by lead aati hai thik hai wo within second me hi lapse ho jati hai ab mai 24 ghante to baitha nahi rahunga aap by lead ke intezar me ki ab aayegi ab aayegi ab aayegi business karunga time lagega mere pass jab free hoga mai dekhunga to wo chij aapki jo customer jo aapka salesman tha usne mujhe nahi bataya agar wo mujhe batata to mai aapka ye package nahi leta kyuki mere pass rehta nahi seven me jab free hota jab bhi dekhta hu thik hai to ye mere sath fraud ho gaya isliye mai pichle chhe mahine se ye baat bol raha hu ki aap to mera paisa refund kar de mujhe aapke sath nahi judna thik hai dusri baat kabhi koi inquiry aa bhi gayi to farzi nikal jati hai to mai purchase hi nahi karta mai usko India Mart block hi kar diya ab mai use hi nahi karta ab aap bata dijiye kya karna hai farzi ka matlab mere pass itna samay nahi hai ha ha nahi thik hai jo problem pehla jo aapne bola ye jo hai na feedback mere sath fraud ho gaya ye company fraud hai thik hai ye apne social media pe plus apne association group pe sab group share kar raha hu aur bhi share karunga aage bhi wait kar lijiye sir mai aap se bas yahi request us din bhi kiya mai meri baat complete hone jane dijiye sir ek bar mai aap se ye keh raha hu pehla jo aapne problem batayi ki ha pehle bhi humne discuss kiya tha same chij ki aapka sold out ho jata lead sabka thik hai within a second kyuki sir ye jo aapki product ki jo hai requirement thi wo kafi high rehti hai to aapka consumption ek log ek by lead ko panch log dekhte the to within a second within a minute wo depend karta hai time period dependency kis time generate ho rahi hai wo aapka lapse ho jata hai dusri aap keh rahe ho ki jo hai fraud hai lead means ki ek bar kharab hai farzi hai to uska definition ek bar bata dijiye jo aap consume karte ho leads usme kya client deny kar dete hai ya fir mature nahi aur uske karan aap bol rahe ho problem farzi ka farzi leads ki jo aapne definition diya last aapne jo hai kadappa black stone ki purchase kiya tha Patel ji ka unja se right to aap ye kaisa tha kya feedback hai is by lead ka to farzi hai last jo aapne matlab farzi hui mai puch raha hu sir uska kya definition hai aap farzi aap kaise kya bolte hai bilkul government nahi hai bhaiya aapne to kisi aur ko search kiya tha google pe to aapne wo google ka utha ke unko lead ko bhej diya thik hai aur mere pass subah subah itna samay nahi hai aap bataiye nahi nahi thik hai mai mai jyada aap diggi mat jayenge aap ha mujhe mera paisa refund chahiye sir aap ek hi chij bar bar keh rahe ho mai to aap sun hi nahi rahe ho na refund hi mang rahe ho sab aapka mai keh raha hu jo aapki aapke sath aap farzi ho farzi company hai aapki dekho maine jab aap se pehle baat kiya tha do teen din pehle aapne bola 3000 square feet ka to 3000 square feet ki leads hum aapko share kar rahe hai sir abhi telangana se aa rakha hai 3000 square feet ka sir mere ko aap mujhe refund dila sakte hai ya nahi bas itna bata dijiye denge ya nahi refund ke liye agar nahi denge to mai case bhi karunga aur share bhi karunga social media pe aap ek bar se baat kar lijiye mere pass samay nahi hai mai share karta ja raha hu nuksan aapka hota ja raha hai thik hai aap mera time waste mat kariye thik hai ok refund ek solution hai sir sun to lijiye meri baat refund ek solution hai sir mujhe itni kahani nahi sunni yes ya no kahani nahi aap leads consume kijiye na hum aapko share kar rahe hai aap leads consume kijiye mahine se yahi kara maine thik hai mahine se aapki kahani sun raha hu mahine se aapke sath kam kar raha hu kuch bhi benefit nahi hai sorry thik hai sir bahut kam hai Gopal sir bhaiya koi baat nahi aap lead me karte to kam se kam aapka ek crore nahi teen crore nuksan karunga mai ye soch ke thik hai ab aap sochiye aapka nuksan thik hai sir se bhi baat hui thi secondary number se hamari sir mera time waste mat kariye thik hai maine aapko bol diya aap apna kariye mai apna kar raha hu thik hai aapka nuksan hoga mere ko mat bolna ki aapne aisa kyu kiya thik hai sun hi nahi rahe ho ready nahi ho sunne ke liye
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund due to alleged fraud.

- Inquiries are fake and a waste of time.

- By-leads get sold out within seconds.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the lead generation process.

- Executive asked for definition of fake leads.

- Executive mentioned sharing 3000 sqft leads.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund, fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, fraud, fake leads
